bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Funding a Collective Account

abstract.p: A system and method for funding a collective account such as a charitable account includes issuing a plurality of financial instruments, linking the financial instruments to the collective account, aggregating individual financial instrument usage, calculating a bonus or other reward based on the aggregate financial instrument usage and funding or distributing the reward to the collective account. According to the invention, members of a civic, charitable, political or other entity may generate collective rewards or other benefits which may be attributed to the designated organization.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: DISPOSITIF DE FIXATION PAR SANGLE D'ATTACHE ET METHODE

abstract.p: A method and device is provided for tethering an elevated individual to a fall arresting anchor. The device includes a tether strap having first and second opposite ends. The tether strap defines first and second loop portions positionable about corresponding shoulders of the individual and being movable between a first open configuration allowing a corresponding shoulder to be positioned therein and a second configuration for capturing the corresponding shoulder to be positioned. A tether point is defined by the first and second ends of the tether strap and is connectable to an anchor. A belt is operatively connected to the tether strap and is positionable about a waist of the individual.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for funding a collective account

abstract.p: A system and method for funding a collective account such as a charitable account includes issuing a plurality of financial instruments, linking the financial instruments to the collective account, aggregating individual financial instrument usage, calculating a bonus or other reward based on the aggregate financial instrument usage and funding or distributing the reward to the collective account. According to the invention, members of a civic, charitable, political or other entity may generate collective rewards or other benefits which may be attributed to the designated organization.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR FUNDING A COLLECTIVE ACCOUNT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE FINANCEMENT D'UN COMPTE COLLECTIF

abstract.p: Referring to fig.3, funding a collective account such as a charitable account (300) issuing a plurality of financial instruments, (305) linking the financial instruments to the collective account, aggregating individual financial instrument usage (310), calculating a bonus or other reward based on the aggregate financial instrument usage (315) and funding or distributing the reward to the collective account (320).

La présente invention concerne un système et un procédé permettant le financement d'un compte collectif tel qu'un compte de bienfaisance comportant l'émission d'une pluralité d'instruments financiers, l'établissement de lien entre les instruments financiers et le compte collectif, l'agrégation de l'usage individuel d'instruments financiers, le calcul d'un bonus ou autre récompense en fonction de l'agrégat de l'usage d'instruments financiers et le financement ou la distribution de la récompense au compte collectif. Selon l'invention, les membres d'une entité civique, de bienfaisance, politique ou autre peuvent générer des récompenses collectives ou d'autres bénéfices qui peuvent être attribués à l'organisation désignée.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR FUNDING A COLLECTIVE ACCOUNT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE FINANCEMENT D'UN COMPTE COLLECTIF

abstract.p: Referring to fig.3, funding a collective account such as a charitable account (300) issuing a plurality of financial instruments, (305) linking the financial instruments to the collective account, aggregating individual financial instrument usage (310), calculating a bonus or other reward based on the aggregate financial instrument usage (315) and funding or distributing the reward to the collective account (320).

La présente invention concerne un système et un procédé permettant le financement d'un compte collectif tel qu'un compte de bienfaisance comportant l'émission d'une pluralité d'instruments financiers, l'établissement de lien entre les instruments financiers et le compte collectif, l'agrégation de l'usage individuel d'instruments financiers, le calcul d'un bonus ou autre récompense en fonction de l'agrégat de l'usage d'instruments financiers et le financement ou la distribution de la récompense au compte collectif. Selon l'invention, les membres d'une entité civique, de bienfaisance, politique ou autre peuvent générer des récompenses collectives ou d'autres bénéfices qui peuvent être attribués à l'organisation désignée.
